juzs.text: Faman 'Azlamu Mimman Kadhaba `Ala Allahi Wa Kadhaba Bis-Sidqi 'Idh Ja'ahu 'Alaysa Fi Jahannama Mathwaan Lilkafirina
Wa Al-Ladhi Ja'a Bis-Sidqi Wa Saddaqa Bihi 'Ula'ika Humu Al-Muttaquna
Lahum Ma Yasha'una `Inda Rabbihim Dhalika Jaza'u Al-Muhsinina
Liyukaffira Allahu `Anhum 'Aswa'a Al-Ladhi `Amilu Wa Yajziyahum 'Ajrahum Bi'ahsani Al-Ladhi Kanu Ya`maluna
Alaysa Allahu Bikafin `Abdahu Wa Yukhawwifunaka Bial-Ladhina Min Dunihi Wa Man Yuđlili Allahu Fama Lahu Min Hadin
Wa Man Yahdi Allahu Fama Lahu Min Muđillin 'Alaysa Allahu Bi`azizin Dhi Antiqamin

Wa La'in Sa'altahum Man Khalaqa As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđa Layaqulunna Allahu Qul 'Afara'aytum Ma Tad`una Min Duni Allahi 'In 'Aradaniya Allahu Biđurrin Hal Hunna Kashifatu Đurrihi 'Aw 'Aradani Birahmatin Hal Hunna Mumsikatu Rahmatihi Qul Hasbiya Allahu `Alayhi Yatawakkalu Al-Mutawakkiluna
Qul Ya Qawmi A`malu `Ala Makanatikum 'Inni `Amilun Fasawfa Ta`lamuna
Man Ya'tihi `Adhabun Yukhzihi Wa Yahillu `Alayhi `Adhabun Muqimun
Inna 'Anzalna `Alayka Al-Kitaba Lilnnasi Bil-Haqqi Famani Ahtada Falinafsihi Wa Man Đalla Fa'innama Yađillu `Alayha Wa Ma 'Anta `Alayhim Biwakilin

Allahu Yatawaffa Al-'Anfusa Hina Mawtiha Wa A-Ati Lam Tamut Fi Manamiha Fayumsiku Allati Qađa `Alayha Al-Mawta Wa Yursilu Al-'Ukhra 'Ila 'Ajalin Musammaan 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yatafakkaruna
Ami Attakhadhu Min Duni Allahi Shufa`a'a Qul 'Awalaw Kanu La Yamlikuna Shay'aan Wa La Ya`qiluna
Qul Lillahi Ash-Shafa`atu Jami`aan Lahu Mulku As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Thumma 'Ilayhi Turja`una
Wa 'Idha Dhukira Allahu Wahdahu Ashma'azzat Qulubu Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bil-'Akhirati Wa 'Idha Dhukira Al-Ladhina Min Dunihi 'Idha Hum Yastabshiruna
Quli Al-Lahumma Fatira As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi `Alima Al-Ghaybi Wa Ash-Shahadati 'Anta Tahkumu Bayna `Ibadika Fi Ma Kanu Fihi Yakhtalifuna
Wa Law 'Anna Lilladhina Zalamu Ma Fi Al-'Arđi Jami`aan Wa Mithlahu Ma`ahu Laftadaw Bihi Min Su'i Al-`Adhabi Yawma Al-Qiyamati Wa Bada Lahum Mina Allahi Ma Lam Yakunu Yahtasibuna
Wa Bada Lahum Sayyi'atu Ma Kasabu Wa Haqa Bihim Ma Kanu Bihi Yastahzi'un
Fa'idha Massa Al-'Insana Đurrun Da`ana Thumma 'Idha Khawwalnahu Ni`matan Minna Qala 'Innama 'Utituhu `Ala `Ilmin Bal Hiya Fitnatun Wa Lakinna 'Aktharahum La Ya`lamuna
Qad Qalaha Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Fama 'Aghna `Anhum Ma Kanu Yaksibuna
Fa'asabahum Sayyi'atu Ma Kasabu Wa Al-Ladhina Zalamu Min Ha'uula' Sayusibuhum Sayyi'atu Ma Kasabu Wa Ma Hum Bimu`jizina
Awalam Ya`lamu 'Anna Allaha Yabsutu Ar-Rizqa Liman Yasha'u Wa Yaqdiru 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yu'uminuna
Qul Ya `Ibadi Al-Ladhina 'Asrafu `Ala 'Anfusihim La Taqnatu Min Rahmati Allahi 'Inna Allaha Yaghfiru Adh-Dhunuba Jami`aan 'Innahu Huwa Al-Ghafuru Ar-Rahimu
Wa 'Anibu 'Ila Rabbikum Wa 'Aslimu Lahu Min Qabli 'An Ya'tiyakumu Al-`Adhabu Thumma La Tunsaruna
Wa Attabi`u 'Ahsana Ma 'Unzila 'Ilaykum Min Rabbikum Min Qabli 'An Ya'tiyakumu Al-`Adhabu Baghtatan Wa 'Antum La Tash`uruna
An Taqula Nafsun Ya Hasrata `Ala Ma Farrattu Fi Janbi Allahi Wa 'In Kuntu Lamina As-Sakhirina
Aw Taqula Law 'Anna Allaha Hadani Lakuntu Mina Al-Muttaqina
Aw Taqula Hina Tara Al-`Adhaba Law 'Anna Li Karratan Fa'akuna Mina Al-Muhsinina
Bala Qad Ja'atka 'Ayati Fakadhabta Biha Wa Astakbarta Wa Kunta Mina Al-Kafirina
Wa Yawma Al-Qiyamati Tara Al-Ladhina Kadhabu `Ala Allahi Wujuhuhum Muswaddatun 'Alaysa Fi Jahannama Mathwaan Lilmutakabbirina
Wa Yunajji Allahu Al-Ladhina Attaqaw Bimafazatihim La Yamassuhumu As-Su'u Wa La Hum Yahzanuna
Allahu Khaliqu Kulli Shay'in Wa Huwa `Ala Kulli Shay'in Wa Kilun
Lahu Maqalidu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bi'ayati Allahi 'Ula'ika Humu Al-Khasiruna
Qul 'Afaghayra Allahi Ta'murunni 'A`budu 'Ayyuha Al-Jahiluna
Wa Laqad 'Uhiya 'Ilayka Wa 'Ila Al-Ladhina Min Qablika La'in 'Ashrakta Layahbatanna `Amaluka Wa Latakunanna Mina Al-Khasirina
Bali Allaha Fa`bud Wa Kun Mina Ash-Shakirina
Wa Ma Qadaru Allaha Haqqa Qadrihi Wa Al-'Arđu Jami`aan Qabđatuhu Yawma Al-Qiyamati Wa As-Samawatu Matwiyatun Biyaminihi Subhanahu Wa Ta`ala `Amma Yushrikuna
Wa Nufikha Fi As-Suri Fasa`iqa Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Man Fi Al-'Arđi 'Illa Man Sha'a Allahu Thumma Nufikha Fihi 'Ukhra Fa'idha Hum Qiyamun Yanzuruna
Wa 'Ashraqati Al-'Arđu Binuri Rabbiha Wa Wuđi`a Al-Kitabu Wa Ji'a Bin-Nabiyina Wa Ash-Shuhada'i Wa Quđiya Baynahum Bil-Haqqi Wa Hum La Yuzlamuna
Wa Wuffiyat Kullu Nafsin Ma `Amilat Wa Huwa 'A`lamu Bima Yaf`aluna

Wa Siqa Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'Ila Jahannama Zumaraan Hatta 'Idha Ja'uha Futihat 'Abwabuha Wa Qala Lahum Khazanatuha 'Alam Ya'tikum Rusulun Minkum Yatluna `Alaykum 'Ayati Rabbikum Wa Yundhirunakum Liqa'a Yawmikum Hadha Qalu Bala Wa Lakin Haqqat Kalimatu Al-`Adhabi `Ala Al-Kafirina
Qila Adkhulu 'Abwaba Jahannama Khalidina Fiha Fabi'sa Mathwa Al-Mutakabbirina
Wa Siqa Al-Ladhina Attaqaw Rabbahum 'Ila Al-Jannati Zumaraan Hatta 'Idha Ja'uha Wa Futihat 'Abwabuha Wa Qala Lahum Khazanatuha Salamun `Alaykum Tibtum Fadkhuluha Khalidina
Wa Qalu Al-Hamdu Lillahi Al-Ladhi Sadaqana Wa`dahu Wa 'Awrathana Al-'Arđa Natabawwa'u Mina Al-Jannati Haythu Nasha'u Fani`ma 'Ajru Al-`Amilina
Wa Tara Al-Mala'ikata Haffina Min Hawli Al-`Arshi Yusabbihuna Bihamdi Rabbihim Wa Quđiya Baynahum Bil-Haqqi Wa Qila Al-Hamdu Lillahi Rabbi Al-`Alamina
Ha-Mim
Tanzilu Al-Kitabi Mina Allahi Al-`Azizi Al-`Alimi
Ghafiri Adh-Dhanbi Wa Qabili At-Tawbi Shadidi Al-`Iqabi Dhi At-Tawli La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa 'Ilayhi Al-Masiru
Ma Yujadilu Fi 'Ayati Allahi 'Illa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fala Yaghrurka Taqallubuhum Fi Al-Biladi
Kadhabat Qablahum Qawmu Nuhin Wa Al-'Ahzabu Min Ba`dihim Wa Hammat Kullu 'Ummatin Birasulihim Liya'khudhuhu Wa Jadalu Bil-Batili Liyudhiđu Bihi Al-Haqqa Fa'akhadhtuhum Fakayfa Kana `Iqabi
Wa Kadhalika Haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika `Ala Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'Annahum 'Ashabu An-Nari

Al-Ladhina Yahmiluna Al-`Arsha Wa Man Hawlahu Yusabbihuna Bihamdi Rabbihim Wa Yu'uminuna Bihi Wa Yastaghfiruna Lilladhina 'Amanu Rabbana Wasi`ta Kulla Shay'in Rahmatan Wa `Ilmaan Faghfir Lilladhina Tabu Wa Attaba`u Sabilaka Wa Qihim `Adhaba Al-Jahimi
Rabbana Wa 'Adkhilhum Jannati `Adnin Allati Wa`adtahum Wa Man Salaha Min 'Aba'ihim Wa 'Azwajihim Wa Dhurriyatihim 'Innaka 'Anta Al-`Azizu Al-Hakimu
Wa Qihimu As-Sayyi'ati Wa Man Taqi As-Sayyi'ati Yawma'idhin Faqad Rahimtahu Wa Dhalika Huwa Al-Fawzu Al-`Azimu
Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Yunadawna Lamaqtu Allahi 'Akbaru Min Maqtikum 'Anfusakum 'Idh Tud`awna 'Ila Al-'Imani Fatakfuruna
Qalu Rabbana 'Amattana Athnatayni Wa 'Ahyaytana Athnatayni Fa`tarafna Bidhunubina Fahal 'Ila Khurujin Min Sabilin
Dhalikum Bi'annahu 'Idha Du`iya Allahu Wahdahu Kafartum Wa 'In Yushrak Bihi Tu'uminu Falhukmu Lillahi Al-`Aliyi Al-Kabiri
Huwa Al-Ladhi Yurikum 'Ayatihi Wa Yunazzilu Lakum Mina As-Sama'i Rizqaan Wa Ma Yatadhakkaru 'Illa Man Yunibu
Fad`u Allaha Mukhlisina Lahu Ad-Dina Wa Law Kariha Al-Kafiruna
Rafi`u Ad-Darajati Dhu Al-`Arshi Yulqi Ar-Ruha Min 'Amrihi `Ala Man Yasha'u Min `Ibadihi Liyundhira Yawma At-Talaqi
Yawma Hum Barizuna La Yakhfa `Ala Allahi Minhum Shay'un Limani Al-Mulku Al-Yawma Lillahi Al-Wahidi Al-Qahhari
Al-Yawma Tujza Kullu Nafsin Bima Kasabat La Zulma Al-Yawma 'Inna Allaha Sari`u Al-Hisabi
Wa 'Andhirhum Yawma Al-'Azifati 'Idhi Al-Qulubu Lada Al-Hanajiri Kazimina Ma Lilzzalimina Min Hamimin Wa La Shafi`in Yuta`u
Ya`lamu Kha'inata Al-'A`yuni Wa Ma Tukhfi As-Suduru
Wa Allahu Yaqđi Bil-Haqqi Wa Al-Ladhina Yad`una Min Dunihi La Yaqđuna Bishay'in 'Inna Allaha Huwa As-Sami`u Al-Basiru

Awa Lam Yasiru Fi Al-'Arđi Fayanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Ladhina Kanu Min Qablihim Kanu Hum 'Ashadda Minhum Quwatan Wa 'Atharaan Fi Al-'Arđi Fa'akhadhahumu Allahu Bidhunubihim Wa Ma Kana Lahum Mini Allahi Min Waqin
Dhalika Bi'annahum Kanat Ta'tihim Rusuluhum Bil-Bayyinati Fakafaru Fa'akhadhahumu Allahu 'Innahu Qawiyun Shadidu Al-`Iqabi
Wa Laqad 'Arsalna Musa Bi'ayatina Wa Sultanin Mubinin
Ila Fir`awna Wa Hamana Wa Qaruna Faqalu Sahirun Kadhabun
Falamma Ja'ahum Bil-Haqqi Min `Indina Qalu Aqtulu 'Abna'a Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Ma`ahu Wa Astahyu Nisa'ahum Wa Ma Kaydu Al-Kafirina 'Illa Fi Đalalin
Wa Qala Fir`awnu Dharuni 'Aqtul Musa Wa Liad`u Rabbahu 'Inni 'Akhafu 'An Yubaddila Dinakum 'Aw 'An Yuzhira Fi Al-'Arđi Al-Fasada
Wa Qala Musa 'Inni `Udhtu Birabbi Wa Rabbikum Min Kulli Mutakabbirin La Yu'uminu Biyawmi Al-Hisabi

Wa Qala Rajulun Mu'uminun Min 'Ali Fir`awna Yaktumu 'Imanahu 'Ataqtuluna Rajulaan 'An Yaqula Rabbiya Allahu Wa Qad Ja'akum Bil-Bayyinati Min Rabbikum Wa 'In Yaku Kadhibaan Fa`alayhi Kadhibuhu Wa 'In Yaku Sadiqaan Yusibkum Ba`đu Al-Ladhi Ya`idukum 'Inna Allaha La Yahdi Man Huwa Musrifun Kadhabun
Ya Qawmi Lakumu Al-Mulku Al-Yawma Zahirina Fi Al-'Arđi Faman Yansuruna Min Ba'si Allahi 'In Ja'ana Qala Fir`awnu Ma 'Urikum 'Illa Ma 'Ara Wa Ma 'Ahdikum 'Illa Sabila Ar-Rashadi
Wa Qala Al-Ladhi 'Amana Ya Qawmi 'Inni 'Akhafu `Alaykum Mithla Yawmi Al-'Ahzabi
Mithla Da'bi Qawmi Nuhin Wa `Adin Wa Thamuda Wa Al-Ladhina Min Ba`dihim Wa Ma Allahu Yuridu Zulmaan Lil`ibadi
Wa Yaqawmi 'Inni 'Akhafu `Alaykum Yawma At-Tanadi
Yawma Tuwalluna Mudbirina Ma Lakum Mina Allahi Min `Asimin Wa Man Yuđlili Allahu Fama Lahu Min Hadin

Wa Laqad Ja'akum Yusufu Min Qablu Bil-Bayyinati Fama Ziltum Fi Shakkin Mimma Ja'akum Bihi Hatta 'Idha Halaka Qultum Lan Yab`atha Allahu Min Ba`dihi Rasulaan Kadhalika Yuđillu Allahu Man Huwa Musrifun Murtabun
Al-Ladhina Yujadiluna Fi 'Ayati Allahi Bighayri Sultanin 'Atahum Kabura Maqtaan `Inda Allahi Wa `Inda Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Kadhalika Yatba`u Allahu `Ala Kulli Qalbi Mutakabbirin Jabbarin
Wa Qala Fir`awnu Ya Hamanu Abni Li Sarhaan La`alli 'Ablughu Al-'Asbaba
Asbaba As-Samawati Fa'attali`a 'Ila 'Ilahi Musa Wa 'Inni La'azunnuhu Kadhibaan Wa Kadhalika Zuyyina Lifir`awna Su'u `Amalihi Wa Sudda `Ani As-Sabili Wa Ma Kaydu Fir`awna 'Illa Fi Tababin
Wa Qala Al-Ladhi 'Amana Ya Qawmi Attabi`uni 'Ahdikum Sabila Ar-Rashadi
Ya Qawmi 'Innama Hadhihi Al-Haya Atu Ad-Dunya Mata`un Wa 'Inna Al-'Akhirata Hiya Daru Al-Qarari
Man `Amila Sayyi'atan Fala Yujza 'Illa Mithlaha Wa Man `Amila Salihaan Min Dhakarin 'Aw 'Untha Wa Huwa Mu'uminun Fa'ula'ika Yadkhuluna Al-Jannata Yurzaquna Fiha Bighayri Hisabin
Wa Yaqawmi Ma Li 'Ad`ukum 'Ila An-Najaati Wa Tad`unani 'Ila An-Nari
Tad`unani Li'kfura Billahi Wa 'Ushrika Bihi Ma Laysa Li Bihi `Ilmun Wa 'Ana 'Ad`ukum 'Ila Al-`Azizi Al-Ghaffari
La Jarama 'Annama Tad`unani 'Ilayhi Laysa Lahu Da`watun Fi Ad-Dunya Wa La Fi Al-'Akhirati Wa 'Anna Maraddana 'Ila Allahi Wa 'Anna Al-Musrifina Hum 'Ashabu An-Nari
Fasatadhkuruna Ma 'Aqulu Lakum Wa 'Ufawwiđu 'Amri 'Ila Allahi 'Inna Allaha Basirun Bil-`Ibadi
Fawaqahu Allahu Sayyi'ati Ma Makaru Wa Haqa Bi'ali Fir`awna Su'u Al-`Adhabi
An-Naru Yu`rađuna `Alayha Ghuduwaan Wa `Ashiyaan Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu 'Adkhilu 'Ala Fir`awna 'Ashadda Al-`Adhabi
Wa 'Idh Yatahajjuna Fi An-Nari Fayaqulu Ađ-Đu`afa'u Lilladhina Astakbaru 'Inna Kunna Lakum Taba`aan Fahal 'Antum Mughnuna `Anna Nasibaan Mina An-Nari
Qala Al-Ladhina Astakbaru 'Inna Kullun Fiha 'Inna Allaha Qad Hakama Bayna Al-`Ibadi
Wa Qala Al-Ladhina Fi An-Nari Likhazanati Jahannama Ad`u Rabbakum Yukhaffif `Anna Yawmaan Mina Al-`Adhabi
Qalu 'Awa Lam Taku Ta'tikum Rusulukum Bil-Bayyinati Qalu Bala Qalu Fad`u Wa Ma Du`a'u Al-Kafirina 'Illa Fi Đalalin
Inna Lanansuru Rusulana Wa Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Yawma Yaqumu Al-'Ash/hadu
Yawma La Yanfa`u Az-Zalimina Ma`dhiratuhum Wa Lahumu Al-La`natu Wa Lahum Su'u Ad-Dari
Wa Laqad 'Atayna Musa Al-Huda Wa 'Awrathna Bani 'Isra'ila Al-Kitaba
Hudaan Wa Dhikra Li'wli Al-'Albabi
Fasbir 'Inna Wa`da Allahi Haqqun Wa Astaghfir Lidhanbika Wa Sabbih Bihamdi Rabbika Bil-`Ashiyi Wa Al-'Ibkari
Inna Al-Ladhina Yujadiluna Fi 'Ayati Allahi Bighayri Sultanin 'Atahum 'In Fi Sudurihim 'Illa Kibrun Ma Hum Bibalighihi Fasta`idh Billahi 'Innahu Huwa As-Sami`u Al-Basiru
Lakhalqu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi 'Akbaru Min Khalqi An-Nasi Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Ya`lamuna
Wa Ma Yastawi Al-'A`ma Wa Al-Basiru Wa Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Wa La Al-Musi'u Qalilaan Ma Tatadhakkaruna
Inna As-Sa`ata La'atiyatun La Rayba Fiha Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Yu'uminuna
Wa Qala Rabbukum Ad`uni 'Astajib Lakum 'Inna Al-Ladhina Yastakbiruna `An `Ibadati Sayadkhuluna Jahannama Dakhirina
Allahu Al-Ladhi Ja`ala Lakumu Al-Layla Litaskunu Fihi Wa An-Nahara Mubsiraan 'Inna Allaha Ladhu Fađlin `Ala An-Nasi Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Yashkuruna
Dhalikumu Allahu Rabbukum Khaliqu Kulli Shay'in La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Fa'anna Tu'ufakuna
Kadhalika Yu'ufaku Al-Ladhina Kanu Bi'ayati Allahi Yajhaduna
Allahu Al-Ladhi Ja`ala Lakumu Al-'Arđa Qararaan Wa As-Sama'a Bina'an Wa Sawwarakum Fa'ahsana Suwarakum Wa Razaqakum Mina At-Tayyibati Dhalikumu Allahu Rabbukum Fatabaraka Allahu Rabbu Al-`Alamina
Huwa Al-Hayyu La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Fad`uhu Mukhlisina Lahu Ad-Dina Al-Hamdu Lillahi Rabbi Al-`Alamina
Qul 'Inni Nuhitu 'An 'A`buda Al-Ladhina Tad`una Min Duni Allahi Lamma Ja'aniya Al-Bayyinatu Min Rabbi Wa 'Umirtu 'An 'Uslima Lirabbi Al-`Alamina

Huwa Al-Ladhi Khalaqakum Min Turabin Thumma Min Nutfatin Thumma Min `Alaqatin Thumma Yukhrijukum Tiflaan Thumma Litablughu 'Ashuddakum Thumma Litakunu Shuyukhaan Wa Minkum Man Yutawaffa Min Qablu Wa Litablughu 'Ajalaan Musammaan Wa La`allakum Ta`qiluna
Huwa Al-Ladhi Yuhyi Wa Yumitu Fa'idha Qađa 'Amraan Fa'innama Yaqulu Lahu Kun Fayakunu
Alam Tara 'Ila Al-Ladhina Yujadiluna Fi 'Ayati Allahi 'Anna Yusrafuna
Al-Ladhina Kadhabu Bil-Kitabi Wa Bima 'Arsalna Bihi Rusulana Fasawfa Ya`lamuna
Idhi Al-'Aghlalu Fi 'A`naqihim Wa As-Salasilu Yushabuna
Fi Al-Hamimi Thumma Fi An-Nari Yusjaruna
Thumma Qila Lahum 'Ayna Ma Kuntum Tushrikuna
Min Duni Allahi Qalu Đallu `Anna Bal Lam Nakun Nad`u Min Qablu Shay'aan Kadhalika Yuđillu Allahu Al-Kafirina
Dhalikum Bima Kuntum Tafrahuna Fi Al-'Arđi Bighayri Al-Haqqi Wa Bima Kuntum Tamrahuna
Adkhulu 'Abwaba Jahannama Khalidina Fiha Fabi'sa Mathwa Al-Mutakabbirina
Fasbir 'Inna Wa`da Allahi Haqqun Fa'imma Nuriyannaka Ba`đa Al-Ladhi Na`iduhum 'Aw Natawaffayannaka Fa'ilayna Yurja`una

Wa Laqad 'Arsalna Rusulaan Min Qablika Minhum Man Qasasna `Alayka Wa Minhum Man Lam Naqsus `Alayka Wa Ma Kana Lirasulin 'An Ya'tiya Bi'ayatin 'Illa Bi'idhni Allahi Fa'idha Ja'a 'Amru Allahi Quđiya Bil-Haqqi Wa Khasira Hunalika Al-Mubtiluna
Allahu Al-Ladhi Ja`ala Lakumu Al-'An`am Litarkabu Minha Wa Minha Ta'kuluna
Wa Lakum Fiha Manafi`u Wa Litablughu `Alayha Hajatan Fi Sudurikum Wa `Alayha Wa `Ala Al-Fulki Tuhmaluna
Wa Yurikum 'Ayatihi Fa'ayya 'Ayati Allahi Tunkiruna
Afalam Yasiru Fi Al-'Arđi Fayanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Kanu 'Akthara Minhum Wa 'Ashadda Quwatan Wa 'Atharaan Fi Al-'Arđi Fama 'Aghna `Anhum Ma Kanu Yaksibuna
Falamma Ja'at/hum Rusuluhum Bil-Bayyinati Farihu Bima `Indahum Mina Al-`Ilmi Wa Haqa Bihim Ma Kanu Bihi Yastahzi'un
Falamma Ra'aw Ba'sana Qalu 'Amanna Billahi Wahdahu Wa Kafarna Bima Kunna Bihi Mushrikina
Falam Yaku Yanfa`uhum 'Imanuhum Lamma Ra'aw Ba'sana Sunnata Allahi Allati Qad Khalat Fi `Ibadihi Wa Khasira Hunalika Al-Kafiruna
Ha-Mim
Tanzilun Mina Ar-Rahmani Ar-Rahimi
Kitabun Fussilat 'Ayatuhu Qur'anaan `Arabiyaan Liqawmin Ya`lamuna
Bashiraan Wa Nadhiraan Fa'a`rađa 'Aktharuhum Fahum La Yasma`una
Wa Qalu Qulubuna Fi 'Akinnatin Mimma Tad`una 'Ilayhi Wa Fi 'Adhanina Waqrun Wa Min Baynina Wa Baynika Hijabun Fa`mal 'Innana `Amiluna
Qul 'Innama 'Ana Basharun Mithlukum Yuha 'Ilayya 'Annama 'Ilahukum 'Ilahun Wahidun Fastaqimu 'Ilayhi Wa Astaghfiruhu Wa Waylun Lilmushrikina
Al-Ladhina La Yu'utuna Az-Zakaata Wa Hum Bil-'Akhirati Hum Kafiruna
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Lahum 'Ajrun Ghayru Mamnunin
Qul 'A'innakum Latakfuruna Bial-Ladhi Khalaqa Al-'Arđa Fi Yawmayni Wa Taj`aluna Lahu 'Andadaan Dhalika Rabbu Al-`Alamina
Wa Ja`ala Fiha Rawasiya Min Fawqiha Wa Baraka Fiha Wa Qaddara Fiha 'Aqwataha Fi 'Arba`ati 'Ayyamin Sawa'an Lilssa'ilina
Thumma Astawa 'Ila As-Sama'i Wa Hiya Dukhanun Faqala Laha Wa Lil'arđi Ai'tiya Taw`aan 'Aw Karhaan Qalata 'Atayna Ta'i`ina
Faqađahunna Sab`a Samawatin Fi Yawmayni Wa 'Awha Fi Kulli Sama'in 'Amraha Wa Zayyanna As-Sama'a Ad-Dunya Bimasabiha Wa Hifzaan Dhalika Taqdiru Al-`Azizi Al-`Alimi
Fa'in 'A`rađu Faqul 'Andhartukum Sa`iqatan Mithla Sa`iqati `Adin Wa Thamuda
Idh Ja'at/humu Ar-Rusulu Min Bayni 'Aydihim Wa Min Khalfihim 'Alla Ta`budu 'Illa Allaha Qalu Law Sha'a Rabbuna La'anzala Mala'ikatan Fa'inna Bima 'Ursiltum Bihi Kafiruna
Fa'amma `Adun Fastakbaru Fi Al-'Arđi Bighayri Al-Haqqi Wa Qalu Man 'Ashaddu Minna Quwatan 'Awalam Yaraw 'Anna Allaha Al-Ladhi Khalaqahum Huwa 'Ashaddu Minhum Quwatan Wa Kanu Bi'ayatina Yajhaduna
Fa'arsalna `Alayhim Rihaan Sarsaraan Fi 'Ayyamin Nahisatin Linudhiqahum `Adhaba Al-Khizyi Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa La`adhabu Al-'Akhirati 'Akhza Wa Hum La Yunsaruna
Wa 'Amma Thamudu Fahadaynahum Fastahabbu Al-`Ama `Ala Al-Huda Fa'akhadhat/hum Sa`iqatu Al-`Adhabi Al-Huni Bima Kanu Yaksibuna
Wa Najjayna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa Kanu Yattaquna
Wa Yawma Yuhsharu 'A`da'u Allahi 'Ila An-Nari Fahum Yuza`una
Hatta 'Idha Ma Ja'uha Shahida `Alayhim Sam`uhum Wa 'Absaruhum Wa Juluduhum Bima Kanu Ya`maluna
Wa Qalu Lijuludihim Lima Shahidtum `Alayna Qalu 'Antaqana Allahu Al-Ladhi 'Antaqa Kulla Shay'in Wa Huwa Khalaqakum 'Awwala Marratin Wa 'Ilayhi Turja`una
Wa Ma Kuntum Tastatiruna 'An Yash/hada `Alaykum Sam`ukum Wa La 'Absarukum Wa La Juludukum Wa Lakin Zanantum 'Anna Allaha La Ya`lamu Kathiraan Mimma Ta`maluna
Wa Dhalikum Zannukumu Al-Ladhi Zanantum Birabbikum 'Ardakum Fa'asbahtum Mina Al-Khasirina
Fa'in Yasbiru Falnnaru Mathwaan Lahum Wa 'In Yasta`tibu Fama Hum Mina Al-Mu`tabina
Wa Qayyađna Lahum Qurana'a Fazayyanu Lahum Ma Bayna 'Aydihim Wa Ma Khalfahum Wa Haqqa `Alayhimu Al-Qawlu Fi 'Umamin Qad Khalat Min Qablihim Mina Al-Jinni Wa Al-'Insi 'Innahum Kanu Khasirina
Wa Qala Al-Ladhina Kafaru La Tasma`u Lihadha Al-Qur'ani Wa Al-Ghaw Fihi La`allakum Taghlibuna
Falanudhiqanna Al-Ladhina Kafaru `Adhabaan Shadidaan Wa Lanajziyannahum 'Aswa'a Al-Ladhi Kanu Ya`maluna
Dhalika Jaza'u 'A`da'i Allahi An-Naru Lahum Fiha Daru Al-Khuldi Jaza'an Bima Kanu Bi'ayatina Yajhaduna
Wa Qala Al-Ladhina Kafaru Rabbana 'Arina Al-Ladhayni 'Ađallana Mina Al-Jinni Wa Al-'Insi Naj`alhuma Tahta 'Aqdamina Liyakuna Mina Al-'Asfalina
Inna Al-Ladhina Qalu Rabbuna Allahu Thumma Astaqamu Tatanazzalu `Alayhimu Al-Mala'ikatu 'Alla Takhafu Wa La Tahzanu Wa 'Abshiru Bil-Jannati Allati Kuntum Tu`aduna
Nahnu 'Awliya'uukum Fi Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Fi Al-'Akhirati Wa Lakum Fiha Ma Tashtahi 'Anfusukum Wa Lakum Fiha Ma Tadda`una
Nuzulaan Min Ghafurin Rahimin
Wa Man 'Ahsanu Qawlaan Mimman Da`a 'Ila Allahi Wa `Amila Salihaan Wa Qala 'Innani Mina Al-Muslimina
Wa La Tastawi Al-Hasanatu Wa La As-Sayyi'atu Adfa` Bi-Ati Hiya 'Ahsanu Fa'idha Al-Ladhi Baynaka Wa Baynahu `Adawatun Ka'annahu Wa Liyun Hamimun
Wa Ma Yulaqqaha 'Illa Al-Ladhina Sabaru Wa Ma Yulaqqaha 'Illa Dhu Hazzin `Azimin
Wa 'Imma Yanzaghannaka Mina Ash-Shaytani Nazghun Fasta`idh Billahi 'Innahu Huwa As-Sami`u Al-`Alimu
Wa Min 'Ayatihi Al-Laylu Wa An-Naharu Wa Ash-Shamsu Wa Al-Qamaru La Tasjudu Lilshamsi Wa La Lilqamari Wa Asjudu Lillahi Al-Ladhi Khalaqahunna 'In Kuntum 'Iyahu Ta`buduna
Fa'ini Astakbaru Fa-Al-Ladhina `Inda Rabbika Yusabbihuna Lahu Bil-Layli Wa An-Nahari Wa Hum La Yas'amuna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'Annaka Tara Al-'Arđa Khashi`atan Fa'idha 'Anzalna `Alayha Al-Ma'a Ahtazzat Wa Rabat 'Inna Al-Ladhi 'Ahyaha Lamuhyi Al-Mawta 'Innahu `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Inna Al-Ladhina Yulhiduna Fi 'Ayatina La Yakhfawna `Alayna 'Afaman Yulqa Fi An-Nari Khayrun 'Am Man Ya'ti 'Aminaan Yawma Al-Qiyamati A`malu Ma Shi'tum 'Innahu Bima Ta`maluna Basirun
Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bidh-Dhikri Lamma Ja'ahum Wa 'Innahu Lakitabun `Azizun
La Ya'tihi Al-Batilu Min Bayni Yadayhi Wa La Min Khalfihi Tanzilun Min Hakimin Hamidin
Ma Yuqalu Laka 'Illa Ma Qad Qila Lilrrusuli Min Qablika 'Inna Rabbaka Ladhu Maghfiratin Wa Dhu `Iqabin 'Alimin

Wa Law Ja`alnahu Qur'anaan 'A`jamiyaan Laqalu Lawla Fussilat 'Ayatuhu 'A'a`jamiyun Wa `Arabiyun Qul Huwa Lilladhina 'Amanu Hudaan Wa Shifa'un Wa Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Fi 'Adhanihim Waqrun Wa Huwa `Alayhim `Amaan 'Ula'ika Yunadawna Min Makanin Ba`idin
Wa Laqad 'Atayna Musa Al-Kitaba Fakhtulifa Fihi Wa Lawla Kalimatun Sabaqat Min Rabbika Laquđiya Baynahum Wa 'Innahum Lafi Shakkin Minhu Muribin
Man `Amila Salihaan Falinafsihi Wa Man 'Asa'a Fa`alayha Wa Ma Rabbuka Bizallamin Lil`abidi
